title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: cotton embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in running, double running, stem, satin, cross, double cross, marking cross,  long-armed cross, knots, eyelet, twisted lattice, interlaced trellis,  and composite stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Thirty-four rectangles of pattern, central motif, and floral border in shades of pink.
name: Sampler
